metadata.title: CVE-2019-13173 nodejs-fstream: File overwrite in fstream.DirWriter() function (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: The MITRE CVE dictionary describes this issue as: fstream before 1.0.12 is vulnerable to Arbitrary File Overwrite. Extracting tarballs containing a hardlink to a file that already exists in the system, and a file that matches the hardlink, will overwrite the system's file with the contents of the extracted file. The fstream.DirWriter() function is vulnerable.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
kibana is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
